running

Class FBLATriviaTester

  • java.lang.Object
    • processing.core.PApplet
      • running.FBLATriviaTester
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    processing.core.PConstants

    public class FBLATriviaTester
extends processing.core.PApplet
    Subclass of PApplet. Represents the menu of the program, the welcome screen and setup procedures, and manages the whole I/O and GUI for FBLA Trivia Tester.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw()
      Handles whether to load the welcome screens/procedures or to load the main in-game menu.
      void drawConference1()
      Draws the conference interface for the player's first choice of competition, including each of the four minigames and a conference-specific progress-bar.
      void drawConference2()
      Draws the conference interface for the player's second choice of competition, including each of the four minigames and a conference-specific progress-bar.
      void drawConference3()
      Draws the conference interface for the player's third choice of competition, including each of the four minigames and a conference-specific progress-bar.
      void drawConference4()
      Draws the conference interface for the player's fourth choice of competition, including each of the four minigames and a conference-specific progress-bar.
      void drawConference5()
      Draws the conference interface for the player's fifth choice of competition, including each of the four minigames and a conference-specific progress-bar.
      void drawConferenceScreen()
      Draws the interface for the main menu of the game, including entrance to the 5 regular conferences, Nationals, and quitting the game along with a progress bar for passing all 5 conferences.
      void drawDrivingGame()
      Initializes an launches a Driving minigame at the regular level (regular difficulty).
      void drawDrivingNatsGame(int inde)
      Initializes an launches a Driving minigame at the National level (higher difficulty).
      void drawFailure()
      Draws the screen indicating loss by the player, which is gotten to by getting at least 10 incorrect questions.
      void drawFlashlightGame()
      Initializes an launches a Flashlight minigame at the regular level (regular difficulty).
      void drawFlashlightNatsGame(int inde)
      Initializes an launches a Flashlight minigame at the National level (higher difficulty).

      Initializes an launches a Flight minigame at the regular level (regular difficulty).

      Initializes an launches a Flight minigame at the National level (higher difficulty).
      void drawInstructions()
      Draws the game's instructions screen, indicating the purpose of the game and how to achieve that purpose.
      void drawMain()
      Handles which screen is to be displayed currently, and based on that assigns each button status in terms of being currently clickable by the player.
      void drawNationals()
      Draws the intermediate screen between the regular conferences and Nationals, preparing the player to proceed.
      void drawNatsConference()
      Draws the interface for the National Leadership Conference, consisting of any questions that were previously answered incorrectly and leading to harder games with those same questions.
      void drawShop()
      [OBSOLETE FEATURE] Draws the shop, in which the player can buy suit items in exchange for currency earned from games.
      void drawSpaceGame()
      Initializes an launches a Space minigame at the regular level (regular difficulty).

      Initializes an launches a Space minigame at the National level (higher difficulty).

      Manages the player's progress through Nationals, and, upon beating nationals, displays the winning screen.

        public java.util.ArrayList<Question> getQueArray(java.lang.String name,
                                                 java.lang.String game)
        Parameters:
        name - name of the competition
        game - minigame that relates to the competition in parameter 'name'
        Returns:
        all available questions for 'name' competition with the 'game' minigame

        Returns:

      • keyPressed

        public void keyPressed()
        Handles all relevant keyboard-related input, used with keyReleased(). Also containts *diabled* secret hotkeys to instantly pass conferences and/or generate random incorrect questions, for the sake of testing the program.
        Overrides:
        keyPressed in class processing.core.PApplet
